DOC.brief_summary: This study assess effect cimetidine pharmacokinetics ( PK ) dexpramipexole healthy volunteer evaluate safety tolerability dexpramipexole give without cimetidine . Additionally , study explore influence genetic variation PK dexpramipexole give without cimetidine .
DOC.brief_title: Dexpramipexole Cimetidine Drug Drug Interaction ( DDI )
DOC.detailed_description: This single-center , open-label , randomize , two-period , crossover study approximately 14 healthy subject . The goal study follow : To assess effect cimetidine pharmacokinetics ( PK ) dexpramipexole healthy volunteer . To evaluate safety tolerability dexpramipexole give without cimetidine . To explore influence genetic variation PK dexpramipexole give without cimetidine .
DOC.criteria: Subjects , opinion Investigator , healthy determine medical history , physical examination , 12 lead ECG Adult males/females age 18 55 year inclusive Male female subject childbearing potential must practice effective contraception study 90 day last dose . History malignant disease , include solid tumor hematologic malignancy . History clinically significant endocrine , hematologic , hepatic , immunologic , metabolic , urologic , pulmonary , neurologic , dermatologic , psychiatric , renal , major disease , determine Investigator . Treatment prescription medication and/or overthecounter product herbalcontaining and/or alternative health preparation procedure . Surgery within 90 day prior checkin .
